item.title: Sonic Radio
item.description: A stylish TUI radio player making use of Radio Browser API and Bubbletea. Github Prerequisites Go : https://go.dev/doc/install MPV : https://mpv.io/ Instalation go install github.com/dancnb/sonicradio@latest Usage After the installation, the command to run the application: sonicradio Demo Keybindings Key(s) Action ↑/k up │↓/j down g/home go to start G/end go to end p/enter play selected space play/pause f toggle as favorite i station info(not implemented) s open search(not implemented) / filter results esc go to now playing 1 go to favorites tab 2 go to station browser tab ←/h/shift+tab go to prev tab →/l/tab go to next tab ?
